variables.name: Input_I0_Settings
variables.comment: Parameter ID: 1004 Access : R/W bit b0-b3 (input I0 function code) and bit b4 (input I0 logic)

variables.name: Input_I1_Settings
variables.comment: Parameter ID: 1005 Access : R/W bit b0-b3 (input I1 function code) and bit b4 (input I1 logic)

variables.name: Outputs_S0S1_Settings
variables.comment: Parameter ID: 1007 Access : R/W (see in device user manual/help file for bit fields details)
